com.mendeley.api.network

Class JsonParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mendeley.api.network.JsonParser

  • public class JsonParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class hold methods to parse json strings to model objects as well as create json strings from objects that are used by the NetwrokProvider classes.
